name: Baked Rhubarb Compote With Fresh Strawberries
keywords: brown sugar, rhubarb, strawberry, dessert, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds fresh rhubarb, cut in 1-inch pieces
1 pint ripe strawberries, hulled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly butter an eight-inch square baking dish.

Mix the rhubarb with the sugar and cinnamon. Spread in the baking dish, cover and bake 20 minutes. Allow to cool about 30 minutes, then fold in the strawberries. Serve warm or cold with whipped cream or ice cream.
